attributes.action: Make May 25th 'Boulby Day' in annual celebration of the birth of Daniel Boulby I
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make May 25th 'Boulby Day' in annual celebration of the birth of Daniel Boulby I.   

All too often I find that my Birthday falls on a weekday, and I have nobody to spend my B'day with.  I demand to make it a 'Optional' national holiday. Drugs should be legalised for a 14 day period, 7 days either side of the 25th May.  Pubs/bars/clubs should serve complimentary cocktails, and girls on rollerskates dish out bugle on big silver trays during this period.

The Queen, and Kate Middelton must also visit me for breakfast on the morning of the 25th, annually.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
